DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study identify prevalence rate risk factor pulmonary complication patient critical trauma intubate mechanical ventilation .
DOC.criteria: An inclusion criterion traumatic patient ( e.g . head injury , blunt chest , blunt abdomen , fracture spine ; without operative , pure multitrauma ) intubation mechanical ventilation admit time period recruit study . patient admit less 1 day exclude sudden death move ward improve condition , etc .
